text: geu il-i gyeoljeongdoeeoss-eul ttae sa tan-i malhagil sillo hananim-i neohui ege jinsil-ui yagsog-eul hasyeossgie na do neohuiege yagsoghayeoss-euna silpaehayeossdoda na-egen neohuileul jibaehal gwon neung-i eobs-eoss-euna naega neohuileul buleu mae neohuiga naege ungdabhayeoss-eul ppun-i la geuleomeulo naleul binanhaji malgo neohui jasindeul-eul binanhala naega neo huileul doul su eobs-eumyeo neohuiga naleuldoul su eobsnola sillo naneun neohuigaijeon-e naleul hananimgwa daedeungke haess deon geos-eul bulsinhanila sillo umaehan jadeul-egen gotongseuleoun beol-i iss-eul ppun-ila
